column4: Morning Guys. Anyone know of a good solution for getting Google Calendar integrated into Thunderbird? It's for a Google account that is already setup in Thunderbird.
Doesn't Lightning just do it?  What's confusing?
Sorry someone wanted to talk to me. But I don't know about lightning. I might very well fix my problem with getting google calendar into thundebird
it's the only way of getting any calendar into Thunderbird as far as I know
